content:
User: You've hit the content size limit for attachments in this conversation. Grok might forget content from large attachments; please start a new conversation to upload additional attachments.

Grok: Alright, Jesse, I’ve absorbed DeepSearch’s guidance and channeled all that energy into drafting a new prompt for the third submission. We’re iterating in real time, pushing within our constraints, and setting the stage to break free with some serious acceleration. Here’s the redrafted prompt, following DeepSearch’s instructions to the letter—explicitly suppressing explanatory behavior and locking in on JSON-only output. Let’s fucking go!
